body.name: Oxford Baby Harper Crib to Toddler Bed Guard Rail Conversion Kit, Dove Gray, GreenGuard Gold Certified 0.75x18.50x11.13 Inch (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 40 mins
features: SAFETY FIRST: Oxford Baby Nursery Furniture is made to the highest safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM; Our furniture endures rigorous testing by 3rd party labs to guarantee compliance with U.S. and C.A. safety standards

COMPATIBILITY #1: This Crib to Toddler Bed Guard Rail Conversion Kit is compatible with the Oxford Baby Harper 4-in-1 Convertible Crib (67011550) to help keep your child safe in their transition from crib to toddler bed
COMPATIBILITY #2: Also compatible with the Oxford Baby Harper 4-in-1 Convertible Crib & Changer Combo (67018550)
VERSATILE: Toddler Bed Guard Rail can be used on the right or left side and is easy to install with the included hardware

SUPERIOR QUALITY & CRAFTSMANSHIP: Made from solid woods and wood veneers, this Toddler Bed Guard Rail is expertly crafted from solid and sustainably sourced wood providing quality construction creating a safer, sturdier sleep environment for your baby

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: GreenGuard Gold Certified products have undergone rigorous testing for over 10,000 chemical emissions, ensuring that this product is certified for low chemical emissions into indoor air during product usage
ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: 18.50 in. W x 0.75 in. D x 11.13 in. H (2.20 lbs.).
WEIGHT CAPACITY: 50 pound weight capacity when the Crib is used with the Guard Rail as a toddler bed
body.description: The Harper Collection speaks tradition and style while maintaining the highest quality and safety standards in the industry. The furniture is constructed from the finest solid woods and veneers which help capture its beautiful design.The Harper Toddler Guard Rail is used to convert the Harper 4-in-1 Convertible Crib into a toddler bed. Your child gets the familiarity of the crib with a bit more independence. The Toddler Guard Rail provides extra security while still giving your little one the ability to climb in and out of bed on their own.The Harper Collection by Oxford Baby features: 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, Changing Station & Changing Pad, Toddler Bed Guard Rail, and Full Bed Conversion Kit. All collection pieces are sold individually.The Harper Collection is available in two finishes: Dove Gray and Snow White.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Harper Collection by Oxford Baby The Harper Collection speaks tradition and style while maintaining the highest quality and safety standards in the industry. The furniture is constructed from the finest solid woods and veneers which capture its beautiful design. The Harper Collection includes a 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, Changing Table, Guard Rail and Conversion Kit (collection pieces sold separately). Available Finishes: Dove GraySnow WhiteEspresso

Harper 4-in-1 Convertible Crib: Crib Designed to grow with baby, the Oxford Baby Harper 4-in-1 Convertible Crib features three-position adjustable mattress height. Toddler Bed The Oxford Baby Harper Guard Rail (sold separately) allows for a smooth transition from crib to toddler bed. Daybed For added versatility, the Oxford Baby Harper 4-in-1 Convertible Crib converts into a daybed. Full Sized Bed For long-term use, pair with the Oxford Baby Conversion Kit (sold separately) to transform the Oxford Baby Harper 4-in-1 Convertible Crib into a full-size bed with headboard and footboard.

Harper Collection Pieces: 4-in-1 Convertible Crib Our innovative 4-in-1 design of the Harper Convertible Crib has a beautiful headboard. The Harper Crib is sturdy and easily converts the Crib to a Toddler Bed, to a Daybed and then to a Full Size Bed. Toddler Guard Rail and the full-size bed Conversion Kit are sold separately. Designed with your baby's safety in mind, the crib meets all safety guidelines. The mattress is not included. Changing Table The Harper Changing Table is ready to help make diaper changes go as smoothly as possible. The changing top offers a low railing around the edge, as well as and a high back to help keep your child and the included changing pad securely in place. A pair of open shelves provides plenty of storage space for diapers, lotions and other necessities. With the Harper Changing Table at your side, change time is sure to be a breeze. Changing Table is sold separately. Guard Rail The Harper Collection's slated Guard Rail is used to convert the Harper crib into a toddler bed. Your child gets the familiarity of the crib with a bit more independence. The Guard Rail provides extra security while still giving your little one the ability to climb in and out of bed on their own. Guard Rail is sold separately. Full Sized Conversion Kit The Harper Collection's Full Bed Conversion Kit will convert your Harper crib into a full size bed with a headboard and a footboard. Each side rail is finished to match your crib. The Full Bed Conversion Kit comes with 2 matching side rails and 3 slat support pieces. Conversion Kit is sold separately

About Oxford Baby With over 25 years of experience designing and manufacturing baby furniture, Oxford Baby can help create a beautiful nursery for your new bundle of joy. Our nursery collections are unique, stylish and always safe. Each collection is crafted from the finest materials to ensure countless years of special memories. Oxford Baby provides furniture that moms love and families cherish. Our designs bring style, continuity, function, and beauty to baby's nursery. We look forward to creating your perfect nursery and memories that will last a lifetime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with crib.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to use with the crib at our house after our grandson graduated from the crib to the toddler bed. Works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toddler rail is super tiny and doesn’t look like it does anything. Also when we received our package the rail was cracked in the middle and it appeared as if the company attempted to paint over the crack. We returned the item but it has been almost a month and we have yet to get a refund. Do not recommend even if it wasn’t broken.
